title: New Fontstruction: Singularity
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107084921im_/http:/typophile.com/files/singularity_4065.png)
  
_Shown above: Singularity and Singularity Ligatures_

I'm finally pulling the trigger on something I've been working on in my spare moments. What can I say? I love a gnarly ink trap.

It's a free download from Fontstruct. Here are the links:

[Singularity](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107084921/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/155435) - Base font; 206 characters  
 [Singularity Ligatures](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107084921/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/167412) - 120+ Ligatures  
 [Singularity Chunk](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107084921/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/167071) - with even gnarlier ink traps; 206 characters

Enjoy! Let me know what you think.
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: One of those rare fonts that can serve as pure entertainment. Download, install, and lig it up!
